name: labrador
characteristics: Labrador Retrievers are friendly, outgoing, and active dogs. They are highly intelligent, easy to train, and loyal to their families. Labradors have a dense, water-repellent double coat.
size: Medium to large breed, weight 25-36 kg

name: golden retriever
characteristics: Golden Retrievers are known for their gentle temperament and beautiful golden coat. They are intelligent, friendly, loyal, and make excellent family and working dogs.
size: Medium to large breed, weight 25-34 kg

name: german shepherd
characteristics: German Shepherds are versatile working dogs known for their courage, loyalty, and versatility. They have a double coat, typically black and tan in color.

name: bulldog
characteristics: English Bulldogs have a distinctive flat face and muscular build. Despite their serious appearance, they are actually gentle and friendly.

name: poodle
characteristics: Poodles are known for their intelligence and distinctive curly coat. They come in three sizes: Standard, Miniature, and Toy. They are highly trainable dogs.
size: Varies by type: Toy 2-4 kg, Standard 20-32 kg

name: beagle
characteristics: Beagles are medium-sized hounds known for their keen sense of smell and friendly nature. They have a tricolor coat (black, white, and brown).

name: rottweiler
characteristics: Rottweilers are robust, powerful working dogs known for their loyalty and protective nature. They have a black coat with tan markings.

name: yorkshire terrier
characteristics: Yorkshire Terriers are small dogs with long, silky coats. Despite their small size, they are brave and energetic.

name: boxer
characteristics: Boxers are medium to large working dogs known for their playful nature and loyalty. They have short coats and square-shaped heads.
size: Medium to large breed, weight 25-32 kg

name: dachshund
characteristics: Dachshunds are known for their distinctive long body and short legs, also called 'hot dog dogs'. They are brave and sometimes stubborn.

name: siberian husky
characteristics: Siberian Huskies are medium-sized working dogs known for their endurance and ability to pull sleds in snow. They have blue or multicolored eyes.

name: shih tzu
characteristics: Shih Tzus are small toy dogs with long, silky coats. They are friendly, outgoing, and make excellent companion dogs.

name: border collie
characteristics: Border Collies are considered one of the most intelligent dog breeds. They are energetic and require plenty of physical and mental stimulation.

name: boston terrier
characteristics: Boston Terriers are small, compact dogs with distinctive 'tuxedo' markings. They are friendly, intelligent, and excellent city dogs.

name: pomeranian
characteristics: Pomeranians are small toy dogs with fluffy double coats. Despite their small size, they are bold and energetic.

name: australian shepherd
characteristics: Australian Shepherds are medium-sized herding dogs known for their intelligence and working ability. They have beautiful coats and different colored eyes.

name: cocker spaniel
characteristics: Cocker Spaniels are medium-sized sporting dogs known for their gentle nature and beautiful coats. They make excellent family dogs.

name: french bulldog
characteristics: French Bulldogs are small dogs with distinctive 'bat ears' and flat faces. They adapt well to city life and have gentle temperaments.

name: great dane
characteristics: Great Danes are giant working dogs known for their gentle giant personality. Despite their large size, they are friendly and gentle.

name: chihuahua
characteristics: Chihuahuas are the world's smallest dog breed but have huge personalities. They are loyal to their owners and sometimes wary of strangers.
